name: Timebound (Team Auboreal, Ayoub Gharbi, Coeur, lisamichele, isaac tumor/Arbel amram, Icecubegame, Leafcutter537, Staintocton, Zilonis123, vulkaara, Holden, Ategon, GraphicEdit, Kowara, Killers_BG1)
name_original: Timebound (Team Auboreal, Ayoub Gharbi, Coeur, lisamichele, isaac tumor/Arbel amram, Icecubegame, Leafcutter537, Staintocton, Zilonis123, vulkaara, Holden, Ategon, GraphicEdit, Kowara, Killers_BG1)
description:
Solve puzzles while going backwards in time every 10 seconds. Shoot something to make it move through time. Some doors may need more than one pressure plate to open.

---

Our Discord: https://discord.gg/JqmaaY32Kt
Feel free to join and hang out :)

Movement Keys:

WASD - movement

E - interact with levers, pick up the Box and Key

Left Mouse Button - Shoot projectile to stop something from resetting

Right Mouse Button - Place a Box on the floor (if you have it)

Space - Do nothing and wait ;)

Hold R - Restart level

Credits

Pixel Art - Ategon, vulkaara, Coeur

Coding - Icecube, Leafcutter, Holden, GhPanda

Sound - tumor, Staintocton, Kowara, lisamichelle

Design - Holden, GraphicEdit

Testing - Zilonis123
